items.title: US Bancorp. Inc
items.subtitle: Information Security Specialist - Officer
items.desc:
• Designed and maintained an automated JavaScript (Node.js, React.js, Redux) application for provisioning user identities and access within Microsoft Azure.
  • Wrote and maintain custom .NET (C#) libraries used for integrating legacy security applications into Office365/Azure infrastructure.
  • Designed and implemented a NoSQL (MongoDB)/ExpressJS solution for tracking application account metadata for all Bank applications.

items.title: TekSystems
items.subtitle: IT Contractor
items.desc:
• Used SQL and Python to create automated reports on workstation and server vulnerabilities.
  • Maintained and optimized database stored procedures and functions.
  • Maintained Java code responsible for generating regularly scheduled reports.

items.title: University of St. Thomas
items.subtitle: Student Engineer
items.desc:
• Assisted with the design of SSRS/SSIS packages to present data from a SQL database tracking loanable technology assets (laptops, projectors, etc.)
  • Contributed to the design of a self-service web application in Django/ReactJS for fetching reports on loanable technology assets.
  • Assisted students, faculty and staff with both hardware and software administration tasks (account resets, mail/file quotas, etc.)

items.title: University of St. Thomas
items.subtitle: B.A. in Economics—B.A. in Political Science
items.desc:
Selected Coursework:
  • Econometrics
  • Macroeconomic Theory
  • Game Theory
  • Cryptography
  • Programming with Data Structures and Algorithms
  • Political Behavior
  • Linear Algebra

items.title: Microsoft Azure Administration Service
items.desc: An Node.js web application with designed for administering Microsoft Azure and its related services (specifically Office365, Intune and OneDrive). Leverages the Microsoft Graph API. Implements a UI built with React/Redux.

items.title: Exchange Administration Service
items.desc: A NodeJS web service for managing users, groups and contacts used by Exchange Online/Exchange 2016. Leverages a "Stateful Command Proxy" for running PowerShell commands.

items.title: This Resume
items.desc: As a way of demonstrating my abilities with Node and other related technologies (CoffeeScript + Express + Jade, specifically), I built this resume page. The app renders resume content stored in a MongoDB database. Check out the repo on github.

items.title: U.S. Bank Internship Program
items.subtitle: Mentor
items.desc:
• Help ensure the program runs smoothly during the summer and serve as a point of contact for any intern questions related to the program itself, career development, or otherwise.
  • Assist with conducting interviews with potential intern candidates.
  • Collaborated with the Bank college recruitment group to expand the internship program from Technology to a program covering all Bank departments.
